portfoliolinks.text: Political Hope (Podcast Episode 101): Radical Architecture with Ines Yupanqui (spotify.com)

profileContent: Inspired by Edo Japan and the architecture of the future, Ines Yupanqui is a visionary architect and civil leader. She is the founder of A Space Unfolds, a design firm that specializes in creating spaces that are both beautiful and functional. Ines is also a civil leader who is passionate about creating a more sustainable and equitable world. She is a member of the American Institute of Architects and has been recognized for her work in the field of architecture. Ines is a graduate of the University of California, Berkeley, where she earned a degree in architecture. She lives in San Francisco with her husband and two children.
underConstructionMessage: Thanks for visiting! This site is under construction at the moment, but you can find some of my current work here in the meantime
